original_text: But you must continue to believe God's true message. Do not turn away from it. Continue to trust God, as you did when you first heard the good news. People have told this good news to everyone all over the world. And God has chosen me, Paul, as his servant to tell this good news.
korean_text: 만일 너희가 믿음에 거하고 터 위에 굳게 서서 너희 들은 바 복음의 소망에서 흔들리지 아니하면 그리하리라 이 복음은 천하 만민에게 전파된 바요 나 바울은 이 복음의 일꾼이 되었노라

sentences.original_text: But you must continue to believe God's true message.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 하나님의 참된 메시지를 계속 믿어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Do not turn away from it.
as you did when you first heard the good news.
People have told this good news to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 이 복음을 모든 사람에게 전해 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: And God has chosen me, Paul,
as his servant to tell this good news.
